meanings.definition: A paste used for cleaning teeth.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new toothpastes yesterday.
meanings.sent2: I always use toothpastes in the morning and at night.
meanings.sent3: The toothpastes decided to take a vacation from cleaning teeth.
meanings.sent4: Her smile sparkled like toothpastes on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The dentist recommended a special toothpastes for sensitive teeth.

meanings.definition: The act of using toothpaste to clean teeth.
meanings.sent1: Proper toothpastes is important for good oral hygiene.
meanings.sent2: I learned the correct toothpastes technique from my dentist.
meanings.sent3: The toothpastes threw a party to celebrate their cleaning abilities.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to toothpastes was as strong as her love for brushing.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled as they squeezed out colorful toothpastes onto their brushes.
